subject: Franchises
lead_paragraph: The Vancouver Whitecaps are expected to be introduced soon as the second Canadian M.L.S. franchise. Bob Lenarduzzi, the Whitecaps’ president, said he expected an announcement before the M.L.S. season opening Thursday night in Seattle. Will Kuhns, director of communications for M.L.S., said the league had indicated it would like to have the new franchises named before the 2009 season.
